description:
After hearing of Genkai’s death, Kuwabara strikes Toguro with the Trial Sword and splits the demon in half! The arena watches in horror as the evil Toguro rises from the floor unharmed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toguro Kei no Bukimi na Kage
Umbra ciudată a lui Toguro senior
戸愚呂兄の不気味な影
